articles.title: Russia joins G20 meeting overshadowed by Ukraine conflict - Reuters
articles.description: Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov will have his first close encounter with the fiercest critics of his country's invasion of Ukraine at a G20 gathering in Indonesia that was getting under way on Thursday with the war all but certain to dominate discussio…
articles.content: NUSA DUA, Indonesia, July 7 (Reuters) - Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov will have his first close encounter with the fiercest critics of his country's invasion of Ukraine at a G20 gathering in… [+3868 chars]

articles.author: Jack Guy, Luke McGee, Ivana Kottasová
articles.title: UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson resigns after mutiny in his party - CNN
articles.description: Boris Johnson has resigned following a revolt within his Conservative Party, saying in an address to the nation that the process of choosing a new prime minister "should begin now."
articles.content:
Boris Johnson has resigned following a revolt within his Conservative Party, saying in an address to the nation that the process of choosing a new prime minister should begin now.

articles.author: Eugene Scott
articles.title: Rapinoe, Giffords, Denzel Washington to receive Presidential Medal of Freedom - The Washington Post
articles.description: President Biden is awarding the Presidential Medal of Freedom, the nation's highest civilian honor, to 17 people, including Simone Biles, Denzel Washington, Gabby Giffords and, posthumously, inventor Steve Jobs and John McCain.
articles.content:
